game.short_description: Work in Progress. You have stranded on the planet Hades. Use your limited supplies to survive and use terraforming to create a beautiful habitable place. (EARLY TEST VERSION)
game.title: Hades Revisited

long_description:
Add craftable palisades into Minetest world.

Support for [Minetest default game ](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Minetest/minetest_game/) and [Hades Revisited](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).


Now only walls are aviable.
name: palisade
short_description: Add craftable palisades in many styles. Hades Revisited is supported.
title: Palisade
